text: Agar tum kufr karo to Allah tumse be niyaz hai, lekin woh apne bandon ke liye kufr ko pasand nahin karta. Aur agar tum shukar karo to usey woh tumhare liye pasand karta hai. Koi bojh uthane wala kisi dusre ka bojh na uthayega.Aakhir e kaar tum sab ko apne Rubb ki taraf palatna hai, phir woh tumhein bata dega ke tum kya karte rahe ho, woh to dilon ka haal tak jaanta hai
